import React, { useContext } from 'react' import '../App.css' import { DataContext } from '../Contexts/dataContext' import { DataProvider } from '../Contexts/dataContext' export default function () { return ( <>
handleHeight(e)} id="height" type="number" placeholder="50" min="1" />
handleWeight(e)} type="number" placeholder="160" min="1" />
} ); }
